name: bluesky-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Bluesky tools: screenshot CLI and firehose viewer

scripts.build: npm run build:screenshot && npm run build:firehose
scripts.install:all: cd packages/screenshot && npm install && cd ../firehose && npm install
scripts.clean: cd packages/screenshot && npm run clean 2>/dev/null || true && cd ../firehose && npm run clean 2>/dev/null || true
